author: Mohamed Oumoumad
description: Re-order text inside the name of selected files

params.name: string
params.tooltip: type the string you want to move

params.name: begining
params.tooltip: if you want to move the selected text to the beginning

params.name: end
params.tooltip: if you want to move the selected text to the end of the name

params.name: before
params.tooltip: the text in which you want the selected string to be before it

params.name: after
params.tooltip: the text in which you want the selected string to be after it
